name: Konnect
description:
Unfortunately, the last level (The long tall one) is not possible to complete, sorry! I had a bad time crunch and missed a jump that wasn't possible. My sincerest apologies. A possible version can be found here The zooming limits are also broken, but this doesn't completely break the game at least.
The game also does not have a winning screen, and either crashes or closes.
Audio is a bit buggy and cut off when playing on the WebGL version. Try the Executable version to fix this. Really bad time crunch sorry ;( How to play:

You need to link computers and beacons together and make your way to the Exit. To turn on a computer you must use a Chip, which will then broadcast a signal to nearby beacons. 
But watch out! Jammers block signals and prevent technology within its range from working. This can be used as an advantage or disadvantage.

Controls MovementWASD/Arrow KeysJumpSpaceInteractEZoom +/- ()*Scroll wheel in/outRespawnRExit to MenuEscape
